S08n637:1: atha khalu mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūtaḥ punarapi taṃ śuddhāvāsabhavanamavalokya tāṃ mahāparṣanmaṇḍalasannipatitāṃ sarvabuddhabodhisattvāṃ praṇamya,
S08n637:2: ekākṣaraṃ paramaguhyaṃ sarvaviṣaghātasarvakarmikaṃ ca mantraṃ svamaṇḍalasādhanaupayikaṃ sarvakṣudrakarmeṣu copayojyaṃ bhāṣate sma |
S08n637:6: eṣa samārṣā sārvabhūtagaṇāśca asyaiva mantramekākṣarasya dvitīyaṃ maṇḍalavidhānaṃ saṃkṣepato yojyam |
S08n637:7: aṣṭahastaṃ caturhastaṃ vā bhūpradeśaṃ saṃśodhya pañcaraṅgikaireva cūrṇaiḥ svayaṃ likhitavyam |
S08n637:9: yatra vā tatra vā na cātra doṣaḥ |
S08n637:10: samaṃ caturasraṃ trimaṇḍalopaśobhitaṃ pañcaśikhāṃ mahāmudrāṃ prathamaṃ ca tāvallikhet |
S08n637:11: bhagavato mañjuśriyaḥ utpalamudrāṃ daṃṣṭrāmudrāṃ vatkramudrāṃ yaṣṭimudrāṃ ca |
S08n637:13: tataḥ padmavajra utpaladhvajapatākacchatratoraṇarathakuñjara aśvabalīvardamahiṣasvastikamayūra ajameṣapuruṣakumārarūpī bahirdvāramūle ālikhitavyaḥ |
S08n637:14: yathānupūrvataḥ paṅkti āśritā ālekhyāḥ trimaṇḍalāśritā evaṃ kāryāḥ syuriti ||
S08n637:15: tato ekākṣareṇaiva mantreṇa pūrvadakṣiṇe digbhāge agnikāryaṃ kāeyam |
S08n637:30: garadattakaṃ ekākṣareṇaiva mantreṇaiva udakaṃ saptābhimantritaṃ kṛtvā tatraiva maṇḍalamadhye pātayitavyaḥ mucyate ||
S08n637:31: evaṃ striyāyā puruṣasya vā yaśorthinaṃ ca catvare brahmasthale vā ālikhitavyam |
S08n637:35: rakṣoghnaṃ nadīpuline kūle vā parvatāgre cābhilekhyam |
S08n637:37: ḍākinīkṛtānyapi brahmapālikāyāṃ śūnyaveśma ekāntasthāna nimnapradeśe vā |
S08n637:38: evaṃ sarvakarmeṣu ardharātre madhyāhne vā sarvakālamabhilikhitavyam |
S08n637:39: tenaivaikākṣaramantreṇa puṣpairarghyaṃ dattvā visarjya ca maṇḍalaṃ udakena plāvayitavyam |
S08n637:42: aputro labhate putraṃ durbhagaḥ subhago bhavet ||
